alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 8:28PM CDT until June 08 at 9:53PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Commerce. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, moderate agricultural flooding occurs with Riverview Park experiencing minor to moderate flooding. Low lying places around Miami may be cut off from easy access. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest this evening. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
